about_the_game:
[More Preview Videos]



[About Software]
Digital Mate, your exclusive and adorable desktop companion, is here to accompany you through delightful moments, providing interactive fun and thoughtful reminders.

Features

  • 🐾 Desktop Pet Mode: Just like an intimate friend, she'll be with you throughout your day on the desktop.
  • 👀 Mouse Follows: Cute and attentive, her gaze follows your every move, tracing your mouse cursor.
  • ⏰ Timely Reminders: Never miss an important event with timely reminders at your fingertips.
  • 🎈 Touch Interaction: Engage in endless play and interaction with her through simple touches.
  • 💃 Direct MMD Model Import: Choose from a diverse array of models to freely swap and customize!
  • 💡 Steam Workshop Support: Discover more intriguing digital companions in the Steam Workshop!
  • 🎩 Hide and Summon: Like magic, effortlessly control her appearance and disappearance—summon or dismiss at will!
  • 🌐 Multilingual Support: Enjoy a seamless experience with global users.
  • 🚀 Lightweight Rendering Engine: Fast and efficient, compatible with games, software, and dynamic wallpapers.


Picture a cute digital mate on your desktop, always by your side during work, study, and leisure. Her big, affectionate eyes are fixated on you, melting your heart! The timely reminders ensure peace of mind, and with a gentle touch on the screen, playful interactions come alive, making your desktop lively and enjoyable! With the support for direct MMD model import, your companion can transform into various characters at your whim, embracing endless possibilities!

Digital Mate utilizes a lightweight rendering engine, ensuring it operates without burdening your system resources while maintaining compatibility with a variety of software and dynamic wallpapers. Especially noteworthy is the hide and summon feature, granting you magical control over her presence, enabling her to come and go at your command!

Embrace the joy and delight brought by Digital Mate, your cute and reliable desktop companion! Let's create boundless happiness on our desktops together!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 , 2 GB VRAM or above
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660ti, 6GB VRAM or above
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Microphone
